>
[Side by Side (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4896) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 162 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
an animal companion

</column>

---

You and your animal companion fight in tandem. Whenever you and your animal companion are adjacent to the same foe, you are both flanking that foe with each other, regardless of your actual positions.
name: Side by Side (Ranger)
